text: And given out to his men the watchword, VICTORY IS GOD’S, with a chosen body of the bravest young men he fell upon the camp  by night and penetrated  to the king’s Gr. court.  tent, and slew The Greek text here is probably corrupt.  of  the Gr. camp.  army as many as two thousand men, and The Greek text here is probably corrupt.  brought down the chiefest elephant with him that was in the Gr. house.  tower upon him.
